name: Avalanched
description:
The more you collect the bigger your pack becomes, making it hard and hard to move around the level. Get to the bottom of the mountain and be saved by the rescue helicopter.

This was the first game for many in our group and we had a lot of fun creating it. Unfortunately, we didn’t hit all the aspects we wanted in the game. However, we did create all of our own background music and sound effects and almost all of our own graphics.
